content: to end of round 36 stitches round 7 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 5 sts repeat from * to end of round 42 stitches round 8 *2 single_crochet in next st 1 single_crochet in each of next 6 sts repeat from * to end of round 48 stitches www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 4/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat round 9 chain 5 work 2 dtr see special abbreviations into same st that chain comes from www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 5/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat then start crocheting from the * in the double dtr group special abbreviation the first time you make a double dtr group there will only be 6 loops at the end next *ch7 1 double dtr group repeat from * to end of round ch7 and slip st to top of first dtr group www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 6/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat round 10 chain 1 *single_crochet into top of group 7 single_crochet into 7ch arch repeat from * 1 single_crochet into top of first group 64 stitches round 11 ch1 1sc into each single_crochet to end of round round 12 repeat last round www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 7/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat repeat rounds 9­12 instead of skipping 5 single_crochet in the middle of the double dtr group just make sure that the double dtr groups are lining up with the groups from the previous rounds www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 8/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas - granny chic crocheted hat continue to make 1sc into each single_crochet until the brim is 2 long cut a tail and slip_stitch it into the next single_crochet weave in the end block your hat and then wear it www purlbee com/granny-chic-crocheted-hat/2008/2/1/whits-knits-granny-chic-crocheted-hat html printerfriendly=true 9/10 4/18/13 knitting crochet sewing embroidery crafts patterns and ideas -
